snippet.title: Official "A Hero's Rest" Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
Immerse yourself into a fantasy world as the proprietor of a small town in a world abounding with Heroes and monsters. Build shops, craft items with hundreds of customization options and manage your resources wisely while making sure to ward off the dangers that surround the land of Felonia.

Wish list now on Steam.

Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2016080/A_Heros_Rest/
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
For More information on "A Hero's Rest" Follow us in our social networks:

Twitter: https://twitter.com/VanargandGames
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/VanargandGames
Discord: https://discord.gg/y9ytRDnYzU

Website: https://www.vanargandgames.com/
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
